subject: Running
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Tourists always remember their first trip to New York. Patrick Makau, who won the Healthy Kidney 10K in Central Park on Saturday, will remember it for the tuna fish and the tape.
snippet: Tourists always remember their first trip to New York. Patrick Makau, who won the Healthy Kidney 10K in Central Park on Saturday, will remember it for the tuna fish and the tape.
